name: Empower
text: After a player has declared attackers, you may spend 1[basic] and place 1 exhaustion token on this spell. If you do, add 1 to a target unit's attack value for the remainder of this turn. In addition, you may draw 1 card. If you do, discard 1 card. Focus 1: In addition, you may select 1 die in your exhausted pool, re-roll it, and place it into your active pool.
